entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -37.2°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:48 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 28.
